channel.title: I need to make Custom Items! some1 answer!
channel.description:
I know I've already posted about it, but i got no where.
I need to know how to make custom items for my server.
People only sent me link to forums, which i had to look for myself, and found nothing
so if people know an EXACT forum post which says how to make custom armour/items/capes, etc, and NOT a forum board to make me look around, please if you could inform me that'd be great
Thanks
~ Me ~

item.title: I need to make Custom Items! some1 answer!

item.description:
@_Joshua wrote:

Client hacking, you could go to the client hacking section, or take a look inside the class 8 i think it is in the client src, and have a mess.

Read full topic
